2096730.name: Peebi
2096730.description:
Prepare for adventure in a world of inconvenience

The annual "Resurrection Party" at Club Deviation is on tonight and Peebi has one problem: she is trapped outside her apartment! Her night will be in jeopardy unless she can find a way to get back in to get her stuff for the night.
In this point and click adventure, take Peebi through a city full of mild inconveniences, puzzles and hidden paths.
Deal with all kinds of odd characters; from demanding influencers and uppity baristas, to cults and a swarm of bees.
Finding ways around problems can be difficult, but Peebi will do what she must to get home: Combine unlikely objects for unlikely solutions...and a little petty revenge.
With locations inspired by the city of Melbourne, Australia and an originally composed alternative soundtrack; Peebi sinks slowly into the subcultures of the city.

Carry what you can!

Your carry capacity may change during your adventure.

No fast travel

With no car keys or change for the bus; Peebi
will have to travel on foot, hopefully she can find a short cut or two.
2096730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
